description: Shortens a string, closed by trailing text, based on the maximum number of characters. Maximum number includes the trailing text. By default, '...' is used as trailing text. By including a third parameter, you can choose your own trailing text.
label: Truncate

options.name: value
options.label: Text value
options.info: The value that's going to be shortened

options.name: size
options.label: Size
options.info: The maximum length of the result string
